author: sebawagner
msg: OPENMEETINGS-429 refactor and split up language editing in several classes, adding new languages will currently not work, needs more refactoring

author: stefan2
msg: On the 10Gb branch: make the I/O buffers page-aligned.  On some
systems, that may improve throughput.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/ra_svn.h
(SVN_RA_SVN__PAGE_SIZE): define our assumed page size
(SVN_RA_SVN__READBUF_SIZE,
SVN_RA_SVN__WRITEBUF_SIZE): define in terms of pages
(svn_ra_svn_conn_st): move I/O buffers to offsets that are
multiples of the page size
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/marshal.c
(svn_ra_svn_create_conn3): align conn to page boundary
(writebuf_write): sending everything >= 2 pages directly.

author: sebb
msg: LANG-799 - DateUtils#parseDate uses default locale; add Locale support

author: stefan2
msg: On the 10Gb branch: make the optimized code path for deltas against empty
source stream handle all headers and write them with a single call to the
output stream.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/svndiff.c
(send_simple_insertion_window): handle stream header, too; combine headers
(window_handler): switch to optimized code path earlier

author: rmuir
msg: make smoketester able to reliably test packaging again
